about.title: Empowering Seamless Payments for Haiti
about.subtitle: We're building the bridge between Haiti and its global diaspora — one instant, secure transaction at a time.

founding.title: Why We Built KobKlein
founding.p1: Haiti has one of the lowest rates of financial inclusion in the Western Hemisphere. Over 80% of the population remains unbanked, relying on cash for nearly every transaction. Meanwhile, the Haitian diaspora sends over $4 billion in remittances annually — often paying exorbitant fees to legacy transfer services.
founding.p2: KobKlein was founded to change this. We believe every Haitian deserves access to modern, secure, and affordable digital financial tools — whether they live in Port-au-Prince, Miami, Montreal, or Paris.
founding.p3: Our platform bridges the gap between Haiti and its global diaspora, enabling instant transfers, cashless payments, and a path to true financial independence.
